In a new interview with Oprah Winfrey , Simon Cowell admitted he wanted to quit while he was still at the top of his game. I asked a successful guy,` What's the best advice you can give me?' He said,` Simon Cowell , know when to leave the fair'. I think that's good advice- one year, I actually found myself thinking,` I've run out of insults, I don't know how I'm going to tell people they suck'.`` Something inside you just says,` You know what, it's time to go', Simon Cowell added.`` Without any regrets. executive chairman,`` a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said.`` We've got very complicated government issues,'' he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries.
